---
id: comms
title: "Open an SSE channel for MCP tool communications"
description: "Establishes a Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream used for real-time interaction with a toolbox. The stream emits event data as processing progresses."

hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: ai-core-api/ai-core
custom_edit_url: null
---

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Open an SSE channel for MCP tool communications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/ext/mcp/{toolbox_id}/comms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Establishes a Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream used for real-time interaction with a toolbox. The stream emits event data as processing progresses.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"toolbox_id","in":"path","description":"Identifier of the MCP toolbox","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"access_key","in":"query","description":"Optional access key for additional authorization","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authorization header (e.g., Basic or Bearer token)","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"toolbox_id","in":"path","description":"Toolbox identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"access_key","in":"query","description":"Optional access key","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Optional JSON command payload at stream initiation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"SSE stream established; events will be pushed until completion or disconnect","content":{"text/event-stream":{"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Server-Sent Events stream (event: <type>\\n data: <payload>)"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"text/event-stream":{}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"text/event-stream":{}}},"410":{"description":"Connection closed","content":{"text/event-stream":{}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"text/event-stream":{}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
